snippet.title: After School Afterlife - Official Trailer | Game Devs of Color Expo 2024
snippet.description: Step into the world of After School Afterlife in this trailer for the upcoming adventure game. After School Afterlife is a game about exploring a haunted Peranakan mansion filled with hungry ghosts, delicious treats, and lively tunes. A lone school girl taking shelter from the rain finds herself on a spooky adventure while chasing the trail of a strange rabbit-like creature. After School Afterlife is coming to PC (via Steam).
